Verses: 1 ippodhum, En Dhaasanaagiya Yaakkobe, Naan Therindhukonda Isravele, Kel.

2 unnai Undaakkinavarum, Thaayin Karppaththil Unnai Uruvaakkinavarum, Unakkuth Thunaiseygiravarumaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhaavadhu; En Dhaasanaagiya Yaakkobe, Naan Therindhukonda Yeshoorane, Bayappadaadhe.
3 thaagamullavanmel Thanneeraiyum, Varanda Nilaththinmel Aarugalaiyum Ootruven; Un Sandhadhiyinmel En Aaviyaiyum, Un Sandhaanaththinmel En Aaseervaadhaththaiyum Ootruven.
4 adhinaal Avargal Pullin Naduve Neerkkaalgalin Oraththilulla Alarichchedigalaippola Valaruvaargal.
5 oruvan, Naan Karththarudaiyavan Enbaan; Oruvan Yaakkobinperaith Thariththukkolvaan; Oruvan, Thaan Karththarudaiyavan Endru Kaiyezhuththuppottu, Isravelin Naamaththaith Thariththukkolvaan.
6 naan Mundhinavarum, Naan Pindhinavarundhaane; Ennaiththavira Dhevan Illaiyendru, Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Karththarum, Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Avanudaiya Meetparum Sollugiraar.

7 poorvakaalaththu Janangalai Naan Sthaabiththadhu Mudharkondu, Ennaippola Edhaiyaagilum Varavazhaiththu, Inninnadhendru Munnariviththu, Enakku Munne Varisaiyaaga Niruththaththakkavan Yaar? Nigazhkaariyangalaiyum Varunkaariyangalaiyum Thangalukku Avargal Arivikkattum.

8 neengal Kalangaamalum Bayappadaamalum Irungal; Akkaalamudharkondu Naan Adhai Unakku Vilangappanninadhum Munnariviththadhumillaiyo? Idharku Neengale En Saatchigal, Ennaith Thavira Dhevanundo? Veroru Kanmalaiyum Illaiye; Oruvanaiyum Ariyen.

9 vikkiragangalai Uruvaakkugira Yaavarum Veenar; Avargalaal Ichchikkappattavaigal Ondrukkum Udhavaadhu; Avaigal Ondrum Kaanaamalum, Ondrum Ariyaamalum Irukkiradhendru Thangalukku Vetkamundaaga Avaigalukkuth Thaangale Saatchigalaayirukkiraargal.
10 ondrukkum Udhavaadha Dheyvaththai Uruvaakki, Vikkiragaththai Vaarppikkiravan Eppadippattavan?
11 idho, Avanudaiya Koottaaligalellaarum Vetkamadaivaargal; Thozhilaaligal Narajeevangaldhaane; Avargal Ellaarum Koodivandhu Nirkattum, Avargal Egamaaith Thigaiththuvetkappaduvaargal.

12 kollan Irumbaik Kurattaal Idukki, Ulaiyile Kaayavaiththu, Suththigalaal Adhai Uruvaakki, Thanbuyapalaththinaal Adhaip Panpaduththugiraan; Pattiniyaayirundhu Belanatruppogiraan; Thanneer Kudiyaamal Kalaiththuppogiraan.

13 thachchan Noolpidiththu, Mattappalagaiyaal Maraththukkuk Kuripottu, Uligalinaal Uruppaduththi Kavaraasaththinaal Adhai Vaguththu, Manusha Saayalaaga Manusharoobaththinpadi Uruvamaakkugiraan; Adhaik Kovilile Naatti Vaikkiraan.

14 avan Thanakkuk Kedhurukkalai Vettugiraan; Oru Marudhamaraththaiyaavadhu Karvaalimaraththaiyaavadhu, Therindhukondu, Kaattumarangalile Belaththa Maraththaith Than Kaariyaththukkaaga Valarkkiraan; Alladhu Asogamaraththai Nadugiraan, Mazhai Adhai Valarachcheyyum.

15 manushanukku Avaigal Aduppukkaagumpodhu, Avan Avaigalil Eduththuk Kulirkaaigiraan; Neruppaimootti Appamum Sudugiraan; Adhinaal Oru Dheyvaththaiyum Undupanni, Adhaip Panindhukollugiraan; Oru Vikkiragaththaiyum Adhinaal Seydhu, Adhai Vanangugiraan.
16 adhil Oru Thundai Aduppil Erikkiraan; Oru Thundinaal Iraichchiyai Samaiththup Pusiththu, Poriyalaipporiththu Thirupthiyaagi, Kulirunkaaindhu: Aaaa, Analaanen; Neruppaik Kanden Endru Solli;
17 adhil Meedhiyaana Thundaith Thanakku Vikkiragadheyvamaaga Seydhu, Adharkumun Vizhundhu, Adhai Vanangi; Nee En Dheyvam, Ennai Ratchikka Vendum Endru Adhai Nokki Mandraadugiraan.
18 ariyaamalum Unaraamalumirukkiraargal; Kaanaadhapadikku Avargal Kangalum, Unaraadhapadikku Avargal Irudhayamum Adaikkappattirukkiradhu.

19 adhil Paadhiyai Aduppil Eriththen; Adhin Thazhalinmel Appaththaiyum Suttu, Iraichchiyaiyum Poriththup Pusiththen; Adhil Meedhiyaana Thundai Naan Aruvaruppaana Vikkiragamaakkalaamaa? Oru Marakkattaiyai Vanangalaamaa Endru Solla, Than Manadhil Avanukkuth Thondravillai; Ammaaththiram Arivum Soranaiyum Illai.
20 avan Saambalai Meygiraan; Vanjikkappatta Manam Avanai Mosappaduththinadhu; Avan Than Aaththumaavaith Thappuvikkaamalum; En Valadhukaiyile Abaththam Allavo Irukkiradhendru Sollaamalum Irukkiraan.
21 yaakkobe, Isravele, Ivaigalai Ninai; Nee En Dhaasan; Naan Unnai Uruvaakkinen; Nee En Dhaasan; Isravele, Nee Ennaal Marakkappaduvadhillai.
22 un Meerudhalgalai Megaththaippolavum, Un Paavangalaik Kaarmegaththaippolavum Agatrivitten; Ennidaththil Thirumbu; Unnai Naan Meettukkonden.

23 vaanangale, Kaliththup Paadungal; Karththar Idhai Seydhaar; Poodhalaththin Thaazhvidangale, Aarppariyungal; Parvadhangale, Kaadugale, Kaattilulla Sagala Marangale, Gembeeramaai Muzhangungal; Karththar Yaakkobai Meettu, Isravelile Magimaippadugiraar.

24 un Meetparum, Thaayin Karppaththil Unnai Uruvaakkinavarumaana Karththar Sollugiradhaavadhu: Naane Ellaavatraiyum Seygira Karththar, Naan Oruvaraai Vaanangalai Viriththu, Naane Boomiyaip Parappinavar.
25 naan Kattukkadhaikkaararin Kurigalai Abaththamaakki, Kurisollugiravargalai Nirmoodaraakki, Gnaanigalai Vetkappaduththi, Avargal Arivaip Paiththiyamaagap Pannugiravar.

26 naan En Oozhiyakkaararin Vaarththaiyai Nilaippaduththi, En Sthaanaapadhigalin Aalosanaiyai Niraivetri: Kudiyeruvaai Endru Erusalemukkum, Kattappaduveergal Endru Yoodhaavin Pattanangalukkum Solli, Avaigalin Paazhaana Sthalangalai Eduppippavar.
27 naan Aazhaththai Nokki: Vatrippo Endrum, Un Nadhigalai Vettaandharaiyaakkuven Endrum Sollugiravar.

28 koresaik Kuriththu: Avan En Meyppan; Avan Erusalemai Nokki: Nee Kattappadu Endrum; Dhevaalayaththai Nokki: Nee Asthibaarappadu Endrum Solli, Enakkup Piriyamaanadhaiyellaam Niraivetruvaan Endru Sollugiravar Naan.
